name: festibask-impro-server
description: Serveur HTTP simple pour tester le site en local

scripts.build: node scripts/copy-to-dist.js && purgecss --config purgecss.config.js && postcss dist/assets/css/style.css -o dist/assets/css/style.css && terser assets/js/script.js -o dist/assets/js/script.js
